item.title: Hakeem Jeffries Counting On Leftist WI Supreme Court Candidate To Deliver House For Democrats
item.description: House Minority Leader says an 'enlightened Supreme Court' - aka a liberal-led court - could help Dems win back the House.

item.title: Free Speech Does Not Guarantee Media Con Artists A Seat At Every Table
item.description: After AP said it would not use Gulf of America, why should it have a seat in the press room? AP suffered cause and effect, not censorship.

item.title: With Each Injunction, The Courts Become An Unelected Ruling Class
item.description: This obstruction is far from what the framers intended.

item.title: Gen Z Is The Most Conservative Generation In Decades Because They’re A Victim Of The Left’s Failures
item.description: The mystery is not that Gen Z is the 'most conservative generation in decades;' it is that Gen Z isn’t even more conservative.

item.title: Trump Derangement Syndrome Will Destroy The Judicial Branch
item.description: Americans intuitively understand that the judiciary’s primary role is to protect the rights of American citizens, not those of bureaucracies.
